2: You are born to be a female gray elf. You have silver hair, purple eyes and a light complexion.
3: Your father is a guildmaster. Your family generally is rather wealthy and well-known in your home town.
4: In your childhood you were fascinated by your environment and the ever-changing wonders of the world. You
5: were a very curious and adventurous child.
6: During your youth you had a lot of fun playing with other kids of your age. You always were a natural leader
8: As a young adult you had to work a lot to finance your apprenticeship. You were often tired and exhausted but
9: all this was forgotten, when you finally achieved your goal.

10: At the age of 311 you end your apprenticeship. You are now a fully learned wizard.
